item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

9/5/2011's location will be:

BAR

Known for being a big name in New Haven Style Pizza and brewing their own Beers, BAR is a part Restaurant, part Pub, part Night Club located on Crown Street.

This being Labor Day Holiday on Monday, it was time for an old casual Favorite.  No particular specials, just whatever they might run that day.

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host/Contact person and we're most likely one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - BAR
